title: Searching shroud.com, academia.edu and other sites
post: The problem has now been corrected and the blocking file removed. Unfortunately, we added the blocking file in January 2014 when our bandwidth shot through the roof and generated over 130GB of traffic in just a few days, nearly tripling our average monthly bandwidth. According to our service provider, this was mostly generated by search engines. With the file removed, search engines can once again access the pdfs.
author: Barrie Schwortz
